title: Band
medium:
Medium: linen, silk  
The following was confirmed by microscope:
Warp: linen
Weft: linen
Red Embroidery Thread: silk
Hem Stitching Thread: linen
Note: There is also a cotton thread with which is either the remains of thread used to stitch the band to a mount, or which was used to partially re-hem loose areas

Technique: embroidered
description: Off-white band embroidered in red with the motto "liberta."
name: Band
